name: Cleaver: Sideshow Circus - FREE GAME DEMO
name_original: Cleaver: Sideshow Circus - FREE GAME DEMO
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT GAME
IN CASE OF GLITCHES - PRESS ENTER THEN R TO RELOAD LEVEL. 

Up - Jump
A - Attack
Enter - Pause 
R - Reload Level When Paused

CLEAVER : SIDESHOW CIRCUS is a retro style 8-bit video game from Mycho Digital, the new Digital media division of UK Horror Movie studio Mycho Entertainment. 

Play as Cleaver : The Killer Clown as he sets out on a quest to collect balloons, meat and save his daughter Lil Ms Cleaver forte clutches of the Circus Du Sinister and its leader the Ring Master.

With the help of exploding pumpkins and human hearts the Cleaver should make short work of the badguys in the classic style Single Screen Platformer.
